name: Glass (Drayx) (Drayx)
description:
See how far you can descend in GLASS! Procedurally generated platforms will spawn below you. Fall as far as you can to get the highest score! 

I plan on continuing to work on this game - feedback is welcome and appreciated! For now, it fixes bugs some bugs on my submission for the 2021 Gull Jam, hosted by our amazing SU Indies Club at Salisbury University! Theme: "We need to go deeper". The original submission can be seen here: https://drayx.itch.io/glass-submission

Controls:

  • WASD  ::  Move
  • Space Bar  ::  Jump
  • Mouse/Trackpad  ::  Look Around
  • F  ::  Full Screen
  • Esc  ::  Quit

Sound and font was found from free to use assets on unity store or online libraries, everything else was my own.
